hits.name: Suggestr
hits.long_description: Suggestr is a self-serve, no-code product recommendation solution for the 20M+ e-commerce brands that sell on platforms like Shopify. Marketplaces like Amazon drive up to 30% of their sales from product recommendations. They have large data science teams that build in-house recommendation engines. However, SME and mid-market brands can't afford to do this, and they don't have enough customer data to make the conventional recommendation approaches work. Suggestr uses innovative multi-modal AI technology that sees and understands products (needs 100x less data), allowing it to work with brands of all sizes (micro SME, SME, mid-market, enterprise). The solution takes less than 5 minutes to integrate and helps merchants increase online store revenues by up to 10% with AI-driven upsells and cross-sells.
hits.one_liner: 10x better product recommendations for Shopify brands

one_liner.value: 10x better product recommendations for Shopify brands

hits.name: Dropezy
hits.long_description: Dropezy is a daily needs platform that uses a network of dark stores to promise deliveries in under 15 minutes.

long_description.value: Dropezy is a daily needs platform that uses a network of dark stores to promise deliveries in under 15 minutes.

hits.name: ITCHY
hits.long_description: ITCHY is a D2C subscription for people with lifelong skin conditions; Psoriasis and Eczema. We connect them to products, treatments and doctors to help them reduce symptoms faster.   We combine all aspects of highly complex disease management into one, single experience.
hits.one_liner: D2C subscription for people with lifelong chronic skin conditions

long_description.value: ITCHY is a D2C subscription for people with lifelong skin conditions; Psoriasis and Eczema. We connect them to products, treatments and doctors to help them reduce symptoms faster.   We combine all aspects of highly complex disease management into one, single experience.

one_liner.value: D2C subscription for people with lifelong chronic skin conditions

hits.name: Optery
hits.long_description:
Optery makes sure your home address, phone number, email addresses and other private information are removed from the internet.  We do this by opting you out of all the top data brokers that trade in this information and post it online.  We cover over 170+ data brokers, more than any other personal information removal service on the market.  Optery prevents identity theft and fraud, reduces the surface area of attack for phishing attempts and spam, and prevents people's private information from showing up in Google search results.  Optery's mission is to put consumers in control of their personal data.

Anyone can create a free account to receive a personalized Exposure Report summarizing where your information is posted online and being openly sold by data brokers.
hits.one_liner: Opt out software that removes your private info from the internet
